channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 02:43 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 02:43 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 02:38 Alarm to Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District- Lajpetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 02:38 Alarm to Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District- Lajpetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 02:20 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Novomoskovskiy district- Dniprovsky district- Pavlograd district- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marhanetsky territorial community and Nikopol.
item.description: 游리 02:20 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Novomoskovskiy district- Dniprovsky district- Pavlograd district- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marhanetsky territorial community and Nikopol. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
